channel.title: EtherinPk
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/bhbznk.png[/img] [IMG]http://fancheck.110mb.com/image.php?id=EtherinPk[/img][/CENTER] Welcome to my project, [I][B]EtherinPk[/B][/I].
Etherin is based on Riotscape, by Lmctruck30. Its is based on [B]317[/B] revision. EtherinPk is focused on Pking. You can't spawn items. You can get most items out of shops but the most needed items you get by killing NPC's. You won't need to train, the home will be Edgeville. There will be an NPC turning your PVP mode on. If your and your opponent PVP mode will be on you will be able to attack each other [U]EVERYWHERE[/U]. You will be able to attack 20 level lower or higher combat opponent. When you kill your opponent you recieve 1 PK point which can be used to get Coins or to get Items.
You can exchange :
[ul] [*]1 Pk point - 500k [*]5 Pk points - 3M [*]10 Pk Points - 8M [/ul]
Items that will be obtainable from NPC's :
[ul] [*]Abyssal whip and fury amulet (Abyssal demons) [*]Barrows items (Barrows minigame) [*]Ranger set and seercul bow (Troll general) [*]Crystal shield and crystal bow (Elf warrior) [*]Infinity (Custom mage arena minigame) [*]Fremennik rings (Dagganoth kings) [/ul]
Items that will be obtainable from PVP Shop(Need PVP points to buy items)
[ul] [*]Fire cape [*]Barrow gloves [/ul]
More to come...
Items that will be obtainable from Shops :
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/24zjek5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/aawv1v.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2evamgk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/mmaayv.png[/img]
If you have any ideas or suggestions PM me or post it here.

item.title: EtherinPk
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Etherin, post:14, topic:315703”][quote author=glestrts link=topic=412166.msg3040348#msg3040348 date=1259069306]

Not really, ppl would just kill each other with 1item…

he’s telling the truth, i was looking through salusscapepvp source and i found the code he’s talking about, it stops you from getting drops and pk points if you kill the same people in a row.

OT. Did you fix the bug that you can kill the same person alot to raise your “rampage” and the kill someone else for like 6 points rather than 2.
[/quote]

Im not using some shitty salusscapepvp source… Im using Riotscape… And if you kill the person two times in a row you will still get the loot but you will only get 1 PK point, and if you want to get pk points from the same person again you have to kill someone else.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2009, 03:38:39 pm[/size][hr]Bump.[/quote]

What’s ‘riotscape’ based off of?

Read full topic

item.title: EtherinPk
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Exchanging PK points for money isn’t a bad idea; I may use it. Instead I’d probably make it 1 point worth 100k though; 500k is too much for one kill, especially if two people are just repeatedly killing each other, or you kill someone with nothing.
